newsitem.title: USA: Intergraph unit says Fong family buys stake.
newsitem.headline: Intergraph unit says Fong family buys stake.

text.p: Optronics, a division of Intergraph Corp, said Monday that Fong Brothers Cos has signed an agreement in principle to acquire a majority interest in the precision imaging products manufacturing firm.
Controlled by the Fong family of San Francisco, Fong Brothers Cos is involved in the printing industry.

The agreement calls for Fong Brothers to acquire a majority interest in Optronics, and for Intergraph to retain a minority position in the new company. Another minority interest will be offered to Optronics employees.
Financial details were not disclosed. The sale is expected to be completed by early March, the company said.
